Description: Understanding the concept of fractions in Grade 3 is a pivotal step towards developing a strong mathematical foundation. Students will explore how fractions represent equal parts of a whole
Understanding equivalent fractions through visual models in Grade 3 enhances comprehension of fraction equivalence. Students will explore how different fractions represent the same part of a whole
Excerpt: Understand equivalent fractions through visual models

Description: Understanding how to express whole numbers as fractions in Grade 3 enhances comprehension of fractions and their representations. Students will learn to represent whole numbers as fractions
Excerpt: Understand how to express whole numbers as fractions

Description: Learning to compare fractions using area models and number lines in Grade 3 reinforces the understanding of fraction relationships. Students will utilize visual representations to compare fractions
Excerpt: Learn to compare fractions using visual models

Description: Understanding how to measure mass using kilograms and grams in Grade 3 reinforces measurement skills. Students will learn to choose appropriate units and estimate the mass of various objects
Excerpt: Learn to measure mass using kilograms and grams

Description: Learning to perform operations with mass measurements in Grade 3 enhances problem-solving skills in real-world contexts. Students will explore addition
Module: Learn to perform operations with mass measurements
Preview: Solving Problems Involving Masses or Volumes

Description: Exploring multiplication of volume measurements in Grade 3 reinforces understanding of measurement and multiplication concepts. Students will learn to multiply measurements using repeated addition
Excerpt: Learn to multiply measurements of volume
Module: Solving Problems Involving Masses or Volumes

Description: Learning to calculate the area of rectangles in Grade 3 enhances spatial reasoning and measurement skills. Students will explore how to find the area by multiplying the length and width of rectangles
Excerpt: Learn to calculate the area of rectangles

Description: Understanding the properties of squares and rectangles in Grade 3 enhances geometric reasoning. Students will explore the characteristics of these shapes and their relationships
Excerpt: Learn about the properties of squares and rectangles

Description: Applying time concepts to solve word problems in Grade 3 enhances problem-solving skills in real-world contexts. Students will learn to add and subtract minutes to solve practical time-based problems
Excerpt: Learn to solve word problems involving time
